DOC.brief_summary: The reference intervals for Sonoclot Analysis may be different between Chinese and American. So far, no reference interval has been established in Chinese for Sonoclot Analysis. This study is going to establish the first Chinese reference intervals for Sonoclot Analysis and test whether they are different from American reference intervals.
DOC.brief_title: Reference Intervals for Sonoclot Analysis in Chinese
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 and older Han ethnic Renal dysfunction Liver disorders Known coagulation disorders Patients taking medications in the last month
